label: FAKE
title: Chemtrails are a secret government spray program
text: A viral post claims that long white airplane trails are chemicals intentionally sprayed to control weather or people, urging readers to 'look up' for proof.

label: FAKE
title: 5G towers caused COVID-19 outbreaks
text: A message circulating online says 5G radio signals 'weaken immunity' or 'create the virus,' blaming new cell towers for COVID-19 cases.

label: FAKE
title: COVID-19 vaccines contain microchips for tracking
text: A chain message alleges vaccination secretly injects tiny tracking devices that will be used to monitor citizens through scanners and phones.

label: FAKE
title: The Moon landing was filmed in a studio
text: A post insists the Apollo missions never happened and that NASA staged the footage using sets and special effects to win the space race.

label: FAKE
title: The Earth is flat and NASA hides the truth
text: A social media thread claims photos from space are fake and that the world is a flat plane, accusing scientists of a global cover-up.

label: FAKE
title: Pizzagate: a secret trafficking ring ran from a pizza shop
text: An article claims a Washington, D.C. pizza restaurant was a front for an organized child-trafficking operation tied to politicians, citing misread emails as 'evidence'.

label: FAKE
title: QAnon insiders reveal a hidden cabal controls everything
text: A post claims an anonymous government insider is leaking proof of a powerful secret group running world events and that mass arrests are imminent.

label: FAKE
title: Vaccines cause autism and are being pushed for profit
text: A blog post argues childhood vaccines commonly cause autism and claims health agencies hide data to protect pharmaceutical companies.

label: FAKE
title: Miracle herbal cure instantly cures cancer
text: A forwarded message promotes a 'miracle' herb or drink as an instant cancer cure and urges patients to stop treatment and share the secret.

label: FAKE
title: Alien spacecraft crashed at Roswell and was recovered
text: A story claims the 1947 Roswell incident was an alien crash and that the government recovered bodies and technology, covering it up for decades.

label: FAKE
title: A secret 'New World Order' plan will end national governments
text: A post says a hidden global organization is orchestrating crises to dissolve borders, end democracy, and create a single authoritarian world government.

label: FAKE
title: The Illuminati controls celebrities and newsrooms
text: An article claims a secret society manipulates entertainment and media, pointing to symbols in music videos as proof of coordinated control.

label: FAKE
title: HAARP is a weapon that creates earthquakes and hurricanes
text: A blog claims a research program can steer storms and trigger earthquakes as a military weapon, citing unusual weather as evidence.

label: FAKE
title: A 'blackout' hoax warns of days-long nationwide internet shutdown
text: A viral warning predicts a planned multi-day total blackout of internet and power, telling people to stock supplies immediately.

label: FAKE
title: Stolen-election claims prove millions of fake votes were counted
text: A post alleges a coordinated plot added millions of fraudulent votes through machines and secret ballot dumps, claiming the election result is illegitimate.

label: FAKE
title: Climate change is a hoax invented to control taxes
text: A commentary claims scientists fabricated climate change to justify taxes and regulation, arguing temperature records are manipulated.

label: FAKE
title: 'Satanic panic' stories prove hidden ritual crimes are everywhere
text: A post repeats sensational claims of widespread secret ritual abuse networks, presenting rumors and forced confessions as proof.

label: FAKE
title: The 'Protocols of the Elders of Zion' reveals a real secret plan
text: A post shares excerpts from a forged document and claims it proves a real global conspiracy controlling finance and media.

label: FAKE
title: Homeopathy cures serious diseases better than medicine
text: A website claims ultra-diluted homeopathic remedies can treat or cure severe illnesses and that mainstream medicine suppresses it.

label: FAKE
title: Bigfoot has been confirmed by hidden government photos
text: A thread claims the government has confirmed Bigfoot and is hiding photos and DNA evidence, urging readers to 'spread the truth'.

label: REAL
title: WHO declares COVID-19 a pandemic
text: The World Health Organization announced that COVID-19 could be characterized as a pandemic after sustained global spread and growing case counts.

label: REAL
title: NASA lands Perseverance rover on Mars
text: NASA successfully landed the Perseverance rover in Jezero Crater to search for signs of ancient microbial life and collect samples for future return.

label: REAL
title: James Webb Space Telescope begins science operations
text: After launch and commissioning, the James Webb Space Telescope started returning high-resolution infrared observations for astronomy research.

label: REAL
title: COP21 produced the Paris Agreement on climate change
text: Nations adopted the Paris Agreement to strengthen global response to climate change, including goals related to limiting temperature rise.

label: REAL
title: India launches Chandrayaan-3 lunar mission and achieves landing
text: India's Chandrayaan-3 mission achieved a soft landing near the Moon’s south polar region, demonstrating landing and rover operations.

label: REAL
title: EU enacts the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)
text: The European Union implemented GDPR to regulate personal data processing and strengthen privacy rights for individuals in the EU.

label: REAL
title: Bitcoin white paper introduces a peer-to-peer electronic cash system
text: Satoshi Nakamoto published the Bitcoin white paper describing a decentralized digital currency using a public ledger and proof-of-work.

label: REAL
title: Higgs boson discovery announced at CERN
text: CERN experiments reported observation of a new particle consistent with the Higgs boson, a key piece of the Standard Model of particle physics.

label: REAL
title: UN adopts the Sustainable Development Goals
text: United Nations member states adopted 17 Sustainable Development Goals as a shared framework for global development through 2030.

label: REAL
title: NASA’s Apollo 11 mission lands humans on the Moon
text: Apollo 11 successfully landed astronauts on the Moon in 1969, with Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin conducting surface activities and returning safely.

label: REAL
title: The iPhone launch popularizes the modern smartphone
text: Apple introduced the iPhone in 2007, combining phone, internet, and touch interface features that influenced later smartphone design.

label: REAL
title: Global smallpox eradication certified by WHO
text: Smallpox became the first human disease declared eradicated after worldwide vaccination and surveillance efforts.

label: REAL
title: The Hubble Space Telescope is deployed in Earth orbit
text: Hubble was launched and deployed to provide long-term astronomical observations from orbit, enabling major discoveries across cosmology and astrophysics.

label: REAL
title: The International Space Station becomes continuously inhabited
text: Since 2000, the International Space Station has maintained continuous human presence through rotating crew expeditions.

label: REAL
title: The Human Genome Project publishes a reference genome
text: An international collaboration produced and published a reference sequence of the human genome, accelerating genetics and biomedical research.

label: REAL
title: Python programming language is first released
text: Python was created as a general-purpose programming language and released publicly in the early 1990s, later becoming widely used in data science.

label: REAL
title: The World Wide Web is proposed and later opened to the public
text: Tim Berners-Lee proposed the World Wide Web, and the project evolved into a public system enabling linked documents over the internet.

label: REAL
title: CRISPR-Cas9 genome editing becomes a widely used technique
text: CRISPR-Cas9 methods enabled targeted DNA edits and became a major tool in modern biology and biotechnology research.

label: REAL
title: The first image of a black hole is released
text: The Event Horizon Telescope collaboration published the first direct image of a black hole’s shadow, associated with the galaxy M87.

label: REAL
title: COVID-19 vaccines receive initial emergency authorizations
text: Regulators issued emergency authorizations for the first COVID-19 vaccines after clinical trials showed effectiveness in preventing symptomatic disease.
